fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: false if the legacy Microsoft Account provider should not be enabled despite the set registration; otherwise, true.

fields.name: Login
fields.description: The configuration settings of the login flow.

fields.name: Registration
fields.description: The configuration settings of the app registration for the legacy Microsoft Account provider.

fields.name: Validation
fields.description: The configuration settings of the legacy Microsoft Account provider token validation flow.
